Reviews.Title: Great Deal!
Reviews.Author: Brenda
Reviews.Content: This package deal is a great buy and received very quickly.  The camera has a ton of features and comes with tons of accessories for just little above camera price at retail stores.

ProductInfo.Features:
This Kit includes 12 items all with USA Warranty and manufacturer's supplied accessories
Nikon COOLPIX AW110 16 MP Waterproof Digital Camera with GPS Function & Built-In Wi-Fi (Blue)
32 Gigabyte SDHC Secure Digital Memory Card - Secure Digital USB Card Reader - Universal Memory Card Wallet
Additional EN-EL12 Rechargeable Lithium-ion Replacement Battery - Deluxe Design Digital Camera Carrying Case with Pocket & Strap - Package of LCD Screen Protectors
Full Size 50" Tripod w/Case - Flexible Mini Tabletop Tripod - Floating Foam Camera Strap - HDMI Cable for direct connection to High Definition TV - BONUS!! FREE 25 Quality Prints (promo code# on invoice)
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon COOLPIX AW110 16 MP Waterproof Digital Camera with GPS & Built-In Wi-Fi (Blue) + EN-EL12 Battery + 10pc Bundle 32GB Deluxe Accessory Kit
